com.gridgraph.storage.heap.index

Class SchemaDegreeIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gridgraph.storage.heap.index.SchemaDegreeIndex

  • public class SchemaDegreeIndex
extends Object
    A SchemaDegreeIndex represents graph storage layer support for vertex degree data, including degree data heap file, b+ tree files for in-/out-/both- types degree index data

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SchemaDegreeIndex(GraphHeapSpace graphHeap, String graphName, GraphMetaData metaData, GraphSchema vertexSchema, GraphDegreeIndex degreeIndex)
      Constructs a new SchemaDegreeIndex by specifying graph heap space, name of graph, graph meta data, vertex schema and a graph degree index

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes a schema degree index, meaning to close all its heap file and index file resources
      void drop()
      Drops a schema degree index, meaning to drops and deletes all its heap file and index file resources
      com.gmmcube.gmm.datastore.core.TreeFile getBothDegreeTree()
      Returns the both-degree index tree
      VertexDegreeDataHeap getDegreeHeap()
      Returns the degree heap file
      GraphDegreeIndex getDegreeIndex() 
      com.gmmcube.gmm.datastore.core.TreeFile getInDegreeTree()
      Returns the in-degree index tree
      com.gmmcube.gmm.datastore.core.TreeFile getOutDegreeTree()
      Returns the out-degree index tree
      List<Long> queryByCondition(DegreeType degreeType, FilterTerm filter)
      Queries and returns a List of Long values representing a list of vertex id, by specifying a DegreeType degree type for query, and a FilterTerm representing the query condition that'll be used to query in the degree index
      void updateDegree(DegreeType degreeType, long vertexId, Integer valueChange, boolean isUpdate)
      Creates a new or updates an existing degree index data by specifying degree type, id of a vertex, the degree value change (positive value for increment and negative for decrement), and a boolean value to denote if it's for update scenario or not

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SchemaDegreeIndex

        public SchemaDegreeIndex(GraphHeapSpace graphHeap,
                         String graphName,
                         GraphMetaData metaData,
                         GraphSchema vertexSchema,
                         GraphDegreeIndex degreeIndex)
        Constructs a new SchemaDegreeIndex by specifying graph heap space, name of graph, graph meta data, vertex schema and a graph degree index
        Parameters:
        graphHeap - graph heap space
        metaData - graph meta data
        graphName - name of graph
        vertexSchema - vertexSchema on which the degree index is to be applied
        degreeIndex - graph degree index

      • getDegreeIndex

      • updateDegree

        public void updateDegree(DegreeType degreeType,
                         long vertexId,
                         Integer valueChange,
                         boolean isUpdate)
        Creates a new or updates an existing degree index data by specifying degree type, id of a vertex, the degree value change (positive value for increment and negative for decrement), and a boolean value to denote if it's for update scenario or not
        Parameters:
        degreeType - degree type
        vertexId - vertex id
        valueChange - the degree value change (positive value for increment and negative for decrement)
        isUpdate - a boolean value to denote if it's for update

      • queryByCondition

        public List<Long> queryByCondition(DegreeType degreeType,
                                   FilterTerm filter)
        Queries and returns a List of Long values representing a list of vertex id, by specifying a DegreeType degree type for query, and a FilterTerm representing the query condition that'll be used to query in the degree index
        Parameters:
        degreeType - degree type
        filter - query condition
        Returns:
        a List of Long values representing a list of vertex id

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes a schema degree index, meaning to close all its heap file and index file resources

      • drop

        public void drop()
        Drops a schema degree index, meaning to drops and deletes all its heap file and index file resources
